description: Navigate to Right Medicine Pharmacy (MacKenzie). Proceed towards the intersection with the Maaburrito and Maycheelin Asian Market on the corner. Turn right at the intersection onto the cobblestone street. The Right Medicine Pharmacy is located on the left side, immediately past Greggs.
